channel.title: phil1988/freedi
channel.description: An open OS + display firmware for QIDI 3D printers

item.title: FreeDi v1.42 released
item.description:
### v1.42 has just been released!
This update integrates the new project structure on GitHub. Hopefully this will completely enable seamless **Moonraker Updates** for better maintainability.
### Update instructions: Please do: ``` cd ~ && rm -rf FreeDi && git clone https://github.com/Phil1988/FreeDi ~/FreeDi && cd ~/FreeDi && ./install.sh ```
This will bring you to v1.42 ![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/c89bd788-c812-4d5a-809a-2ccb2e5bc331)
The next release will show if the update...
